PF2EAUTOLOOT.Settings.Title: PF2e Autoloot
pf2e-autoloot.settings.autoloot.name: Auto Roll for loot by actor name
pf2e-autoloot.settings.autoloot.hint: Each time a loot actor token with the names assigned below is opened, the loot will be automatically distributed without GM intervention.
pf2e-autoloot.settings.avoidNamesRegex.h: If you need an item to not appear in the item roll, write its slug here like this. Ex: (?:endless-quiver|rusting-ammunition-greater|etc)
Probability of being empty (0–100%) for Barrels
pf2e-autoloot.settings.empty-key.crate.n: Probability of being empty (0–100%) for Crates
pf2e-autoloot.settings.empty-key.chest.n: Probability of being empty (0–100%) for Chests
pf2e-autoloot.settings.empty-key.pouch.n: Probability of being empty (0–100%) for Pouhes
pf2e-autoloot.settings.empty-key.stash.n: Probability of being empty (0–100%) for Stashes
pf2e-autoloot.settings.empty-key.hint: Probability that the container has nothing.
pf2e-autoloot.settings.count-key.hint: Minimum and maximum number of items per container generation.
pf2e-autoloot.settings.minimumChestLevel: Minimum item level that appears depending on the average party level. (APL - this number)
pf2e-autoloot.settings.maximumChestLevel: Maximum item level that appears depending on the average party level. (APL + this number)
Items appearing in Crate containers will be limited to (Average level +/- offset)
Items appearing in Stash containers will be limited to (Average level +/- offset)
pf2e-autoloot.settings.maxStack.name: Maximum quantity per item generated
pf2e-autoloot.settings.budgetFraction.hi: Fraction of PF2e ‘Total Value’ per party level (default 0.01 = 1%)
pf2e-autoloot.dialog.containerType.title: What type of container is this?
